sentences: Alecia Elliott (born December 25, 1982) is an American contemporary country music singer and actress.
Elliott issued her first studio recording on MCA Nashville in 2000 entitled I'm Diggin' It.
She returned in 2019 with a new record label, and new music.
In December 2019, Alecia Elliott returned to music with a new single called "What Love Can Do" under Muscle Shoals Recordings.
It is her first single since 2001.
Her second studio album, Voodoo, was released in September 2020.
